availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Osborne (Louisville, Kentucky, grocer, real estate agent, attorney, and politician)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, grocer, real estate agent, attorney, and politician. Nelson County, Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Willin Osborne in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 15, 1845. Father of Mary Osborne. Grocer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Real estate collector in Louisville in 1860. Real estate agent in Louisville from 1860 to 1862. Member of the Board of Alderman in Louisville from 1861 to 1865. Attorney in Louisville in 1865. Real estate agent in partnership with John McAteer in Louisville in 1865.
